name: Crusader Kings 2 Save File
description: Regex for getting an object from the CK2 save file format.
content:
CK2txt
	version="2.2"
	date="769.1.1"
	player=
	{
		id=6392
		type=66
	}
	player_realm=
	{
		title="k_france"
	}
	rebel=1
	unit=0
	sub_unit=0.0
	start_date="769.1.1"
a = { agfeageagea }
author: GPC
